data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Code,
        keybind,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    let active = false;
</script>

<svelte:window
    use:keybind={{
        binds: "f5",
        on_bind: (event) => {
            event.preventDefault();
            active = event.detail.active;
        },
    }}
/>

<Box
    palette={active ? "affirmative" : "negative"}
    padding="small"
>
    Press F5 to activate bind.
</Box>
data.title: keybind Event Management
